refnamediv.refpurpose: get file descriptor linked to an SSL object

refsection.title: DESCRIPTION
refsection.para: SSL_get_fd() returns the file descriptor which is linked to ssl. SSL_get_rfd() and SSL_get_wfd() return the file descriptors for the read or the write channel, which can be different. If the read and the write channel are different, SSL_get_fd() will return the file descriptor of the read channel.

refsection.title: RETURN VALUES
refsection.para: The following return values can occur:

listitem.para: The operation failed, because the underlying BIO is not of the correct type (suitable for file descriptors).
The file descriptor linked to ssl.
